articles.title: Watch: Fraser Minten scores game-sealing goal for Bruins against his former team
articles.description:
Minten was once a top prospect in Toronto's pipeline before being traded to the Bruins.

The post Watch: Fraser Minten scores game-sealing goal for Bruins against his former team appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Fraser Minten scored the game-sealing goal for the Bruins against Toronto on November 8, 2025.
Minten, a former top prospect, was traded from Toronto to the Bruins earlier this season.
His performance boosts Bruins' morale and strengthens their position in the NHL standings.

articles.title: Bruins legend Zdeno Chara describes ‘surreal’ induction into Hockey Hall of Fame
articles.description:
Chara was given his Hall of Fame ring and plaque on Saturday as part of the weekend-long induction festivities.

The post Bruins legend Zdeno Chara describes ‘surreal’ induction into Hockey Hall of Fame appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Zdeno Chara received his Hall of Fame ring and plaque on November 8, 2025.
Chara's induction celebrates his significant contributions to the Boston Bruins.
Local fans can attend events honoring Chara's legacy throughout the weekend.
